item_prototype.name: Состояние батареи RAID-контроллера {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: This column is used to offer a name of one RAID controller.

item_prototype.name: Модель RAID-контроллера {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: This column is used to offer a name of one RAID controller.

item_prototype.name: {#FANDESCR}: Fan speed, %
item_prototype.description: LENOVO-XCC-MIB Fan speed expressed in percent(%) of maximum RPM. An octet string expressed as 'ddd% of maximum' where: d is a decimal digit or blank space for a leading zero. If the fan is determined not to be running or the fan speed cannot be determined, the string will indicate 'Offline'.

item_prototype.name: Состояние вентилятора {#FANDESCR}
item_prototype.description: LENOVO-XCC-MIB A description of the fan measurement channel.

trigger_prototype.name: Состояние вентилятора {#FANDESCR} не normal
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

item_prototype.name: Состояние физического диска {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: LENOVO-XCC-MIB A description of the disk module status.

trigger_prototype.name: Состояние физического диска {#SNMPINDEX} не OK
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

item_prototype.name: Состояние блока питания {#PSU_DESCR}
item_prototype.description: LENOVO-XCC-MIB A description of the power module status.

trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Состояние блока питания не normal
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: Состояние RAID Volume {#SNMPVALUE} name {#DISKNAME} не Optimal ( {ITEM.LASTVALUE} )
{#SNMPVALUE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: Ambient: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}

trigger_prototype.name: CPU: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#VOLTDESCR}: Status
item_prototype.description: LENOVO-XCC-MIB A description of the voltage component status.

trigger_prototype.name: {#VOLTDESCR}: voltage is not in normal state
